DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect on epithelial barrier function of three emarketed multi-purpose solution applied to the human eye with hydrogel lenses as during normal regimen use.
DOC.brief_title: Corneal Barrier Function With Multi-Purpose Solutions
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect on epithelial barrier function of three emarketed multi-purpose solution applied to the human eye with hydrogel lenses as during normal regimen use.
DOC.criteria: Adapted daily soft contact lens wearers, at least 18 years of age, vision correctable to 20/40 Ocular or systemic allergies, abnormalities of the cornea, active ocular infection, prior keratorefractive surgery, use of ocular medications
DOC.keyword: barrier function, multi-purpose solutions, silicone hydrogel contact lenses
